description: Array containing a breakdown of the income received for foreign property by country code for the retrieved tax calculation.

incomeSourceId.title: incomeSourceId
incomeSourceId.description: The unique identifier of the income source.

countryCode.description: A three-letter code that represents a country name. This value must in ISO 3166-1 Alpha-3 format.

totalIncome.description: The total income for foreign property. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalExpenses.description: The total expenses for foreign property. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

netProfit.description: The net profit for foreign property. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

netLoss.description: The net loss for foreign property. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalAdditions.description: The total additions to the net profit (or deductions from the net loss) for the foreign property business. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalDeductions.description: The total deductions from the net loss (or additions to the net profit) for the foreign property business. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxableProfit.description: The taxable profit after all additions and deductions have been applied for the foreign property business. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

adjustedIncomeTaxLoss.description: The adjusted Income Tax loss after all additions and deductions have been applied for the foreign property business. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
